segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and take it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on full blast, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water edges over, splashing down steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms at her feet, yet she polishes away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, open cabinets reveal the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on the stool, arm extended inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tips slightlyâ€” whoa, that's precarious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, multitasking sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, hand out for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, eyes on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a neat garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters in, highlighting the indoor spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a busy, lively spot despite the oversight.
segments.speaker: PAR
